title: Kroll's Whalen Sees Fed's Bank Stress Tests as Miguided (Audio)
itunes:title: Kroll's Whalen Sees Fed's Bank Stress Tests as Miguided (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Chris Whalen, Senior Managing Director at the Kroll Bond Rating Agency, on the Fed's stress tests for banks.
